artisan.description: Runs an artisan command in the current directory

command-help.name: command-help
command-help.description: Passes --help to the underlying artisan command

args.name: command
args.description: The command to pass to artisan. Omit this to see available commands

composer.description: Executes a Composer command in the current directory

command-help.name: command-help
command-help.description: Passes --help to the underlying composer command

args.name: command
args.description: The command to pass to composer. Omit this to see available commands

configure.description: Configures an existing vanilla Laravel app as an Up project

args.name: directory
args.description: The target directory for Laravel Up

down.description: Stops a running Laravel Up environment

destroy.name: destroy
destroy.description: Stops Docker containers and removes all volumes

args.name: directory
args.description: The target directory for Laravel Up

new.description: Creates a new Laravel Up project

args.name: directory
args.description: The target directory for Laravel Up
